dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 3713 IH: To amend the Trademark Act of 1946 to provide for the registration of marks consisting of a flag, coat of arms, or other official insignia of the United States or of any State or local government, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Jeffries (for himself and Mr. Poe of Texas) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Trademark Act of 1946 to provide for the registration of marks consisting of a flag, coat of arms, or other official insignia of the United States or of any State or local government, and for other purposes.

section.header: Registration of certain marks of the United States and State and local governments
